https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rAv1hNQwrXyFWN9vJaUr8wuNEOW.jpg Documentary on the life of an Iraqi POW who got caught by the Iranians during the war 19 years ago. In prison, he writes a letter to his child, whom he has never seen. Captive, Waiting
